title: ICEBRK Token Transaction Tax Adjustment
body:
Should the ICEBRKDAO adjust the transaction taxes on ICEBRK token to the following:
- 3% reflect (unchanged)
- 2% burn (+2% change)
- 1% liquidity pool & charity donation (0.75%/0.25%, -3% overall change)
- 1% project development (unchanged)

This would create a 12.5% reduction in total fees from 8% per transaction down to 7%, while also increasing the burn rate by roughly 600% to gradually raise the price floor.

Current tax (for reference):
3% reflect
3% liquidity pool
1% charity donation
1% project development
author: 0x30bc20753b325C7F7B3e55daEB464C348C5e8096
